title: Duet For Tenor and Transradial Orthosis
description: Original WorkThe first thing I noticed were his hands, which were stained beyond all washing by brown-black grease hiding in the creases of his knuckles and beneath what little of his fingernails hadn't been bitten down to the quick.Shousetsu Bang*Bang volume 7, issue 29http://s2b2.livejournal.com/168145.htmlWords: 22750 complete
